title._content: [Unidentified soldier in uniform with musket and holstered bayonet] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in uniform with musket and holstered bayonet] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.3 x 7.8 cm (oval case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 3-407. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Purchased from: North South Trader's Civil War, sponsors of National Civil War & Antique Arms Show, Orange, Virginia, 2002. Subjects: Soldiers--1860-1870. Military uniforms--1860-1870. Rifles--1860-1870. Bayonets--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel. Format: Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.27399 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2534
